backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with order, design, user, karigar, image, access control, and storage types and state maps, plus validation helpers and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that transfers karigarStorage from the old actor structure to the new one unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent frontend changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global style resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icon assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first and network-first strategies for assets and documents, with install, fetch, and activate handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router and bootstrap flow handling auth, role checks, blocked users, error states, and route layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/TotalQtyBr: Displays a dialog showing total and categorized quantity breakdown with computed grand total.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Displays a blocked account message and provides a logout action clearing identity and queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Handles profile bootstrap errors with retry, logout, and detailed error presentation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Informs authenticated users without profiles and lets them copy their principal ID and refresh.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first admin user to set their name and complete initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Guards child components by role, showing loading or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table listing design image mappings with codes, names, and creation dates.
Dialog to fetch and display a design image with loading, error, and no-image states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Error boundary that catches app errors, shows details, and offers reload or logout options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel that shows technical error details and allows copying the raw error string.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert that displays a message, optional retry button, and optional technical details panel.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown export menu for orders, supporting CSV exports and per-karigar PDF/JPEG downloads.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Export toolbar for a specific karigar, allowing PDF/JPEG exports for daily or total orders.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: Filter-based export controls enabling PDF/JPEG export of karigar orders by date or design code.
frontend/src/components/karigar/AddKarig: Dialog to create a new karigar with form submission and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Dialog to view full karigar order details, including metadata and image viewer access.
Defines the main application shell with role-based navigation and responsive mobile/desktop menus.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Provides a dialog form for creating or editing master designs, handling karigar lookup, validation, and save mutations.
Implements a dialog to import master designs from files, parse them, show a summary, and save results.
Renders a table of master designs with edit and activation toggles.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Displays a preview table of ingested orders, highlighting unmapped codes and showing order details.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Shows a warning banner when invalid cached orders are detected, with an option to clear the cache.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Provides UI controls to filter orders by karigar, status, date range, order number, and flags, using sanitized orders to generate unique filter options.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Renders a table of sanitized orders with optional row selection, action buttons, and conditional styling for returned orders.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog allowing users to enter partial supplied quantities per order with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog for editing an RB order’s total supplied quantity with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Displays backend reachability status with refresh controls, canister ID visibility, and error details.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Shows online/offline status and pending sync queue, allowing manual sync when online.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs a health check on the backend using a safe actor and reports reachability status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with success/error state and dynamic button labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile via a safe actor with error classification and controlled retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Computes the user's effective app role by combining profile data with backend admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges them with backend data, sanitizes cache, and exposes loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines various data-fetching and mutation hooks using the actor for orders, designs, and related backend operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates an actor with timeout handling, safe access control initialization, and non-retryable error detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus custom admin tab styles.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates a printable HTML/PDF export of Karigar orders with totals, table output, and iOS-safe download handling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by export type and generates a downloadable CSV with sorted rows where applicable.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Maps orders to master design entries, preserving meaningful karigar names and reporting mapped/unmapped results.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits orders into fixed-size batches with basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes total and per-karigar order metrics after sanitizing invalid entries.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Trims karigar names and converts empty values to 'Unassigned'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatOptionalNu: Formats optional numeric fields with fixed decimals or returns empty string if invalid.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Creates deterministic PO codes from karigar names using the first three letters and a fixed suffix.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns an order's timestamp from uploadDate or createdAt, converting nanoseconds to milliseconds.
Determines if an order type indicates a customer order by checking for 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts valid orders by normalized design code and then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sorts valid orders by formatted karigar name, then design code, then order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Validates order objects and filters invalid entries while logging skipped items.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Extracts embedded images from XLSX files using JSZip, mapping them to sequential rows.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses an Excel sheet with 3 required columns and extracts embedded images mapped by row. Validates headers, locates images, and returns parsed rows with errors when fields or images are missing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Reads master design mappings from an Excel workbook using flexible column name matching. Extracts design code plus optional generic and karigar names into structured entries.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel sheet with flexible headers, handling required fields, optional numeric fields, and row-level errors and warnings. Produces validated PersistentOrder objects along with warnings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Dynamically loads SheetJS if needed and reads an Excel file into a workbook. Validates the workbook and provides clear error messages for loading or parsing failures.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Routes master design parsing to either PDF or Excel handlers based on file type. Wraps parsing with error handling and uses shared Excel/PDF parsing utilities.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Determines whether to parse orders from PDF or Excel, delegating to the appropriate parser. Returns parsed orders with warnings and handles user‑friendly error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Dynamically loads PDF.js and extracts structured text from each page, grouping text by lines for downstream table parsing. Handles common PDF errors with descriptive messages.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Flattens PDF text lines, detects a header row, and extracts design code, generic name, and karigar name into MasterDesignEntry tuples.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using table-row or section-header modes, building PersistentOrder objects with timestamps and validations.
Parses a single table-format PDF row into a PersistentOrder, validating formats and extracting numeric fields and karigar name.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, and queued ingestion batches with CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Provides a React hook to sync queued offline ingestions, uploading batches and updating UI sync state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabs, filters, cached data handling, and order management UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Handles uploading, parsing, previewing, and saving design image mappings from Excel files.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays and manages master design mappings with search, add, edit, and import features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides user creation, approval management, and block/unblock controls for administrators.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows karigar orders, filtering tools, approval request flow, and bulk delivery actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a styled login screen with branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Initializes the first admin using a bootstrap token and refreshes actor sessions.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Parses order files, applies master design mappings, previews results, and uploads orders in batches.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Staff dashboard showing orders, activity logs, filters, tabs, and dialogs with filtering logic and cached data handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Displays unmapped design codes grouped by code with search, error handling, and a dialog to create master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, logs update events, and periodically checks for service worker updates.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped canister, network, or generic categories and extracts safe diagnostic info.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Generates user-friendly error messages using bootstrap classification and decoding logic for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters for routing state.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout and rejects if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin support.
project_state.json: Project state metadata outlining karigar dropdown issues, existing features, and new backend/UX requests for KarigarFlow.
